episodes.title: The Most Controversial Millionaire Preacher in South Africa | Reggie Yates | Free Documentary
episodes.description:
Reggie Yates’ Extreme - South Africa: The Millionaire Preacher 

Reggie Yates’ Extreme - UK: Gay and Under Attack: https://youtu.be/Iw5wPzFCqVU

South Africa is a country devoted to God. But forget priests and bishops, many people here go direct to a Prophet for their faith. Reggie is spending a week with one of the most controversial and colourful of them all- Prophet Mboro. 

Mboro is adored by the thousands of followers in his megachurch and renowned as much for his wacky breakdancing as the ‘miracles’ he performs. It’s a crazy world of witchcraft, exorcisms and AK-47s, but even here can a multi-millionaire King of Bling with 30 flash cars really be a messenger from God? Reggie has already rejected a Pentecostal faith once in his life, and he’s soon determined to expose this showman ‘charlatan’. But the deeper Reggie digs, the more conflicted he becomes- until he starts to confront some truths much closer to home.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
